text: 16|63|(napiye!) Allahvin mitu cattiyamaka! Umakku munnirunta pala vakupparkalukkum nam (nam) tutarkalai anuppivaittom. Eninum, saittan avarkalukkum avarkalutaiya (tiya) kariyankalaiye alakakak kanpittan. Inraiya tinam ivarkalukkum avane nanpanavan. Akave, ivarkalukku mikka tunpuruttum vetanai untu
